Welcome to A-GeoCat

Alfobre Geodata Catalog

Browse by Category

Archaeology Arts Economy Education Environment Islam Military Modern Prehistory Routes Uncategorized


A-GeoCat is a geospatial open data catalog developed and maintained by Alfobre.

Alfobre (portuguese for seedbed) is a collective devoted to the creation and development of projects, strategies and products in the Heritage field.

Contact info
